data.title: the charts below show the most popular films by genre for men and women and general ticket sales for different types of film in the USA in 2010.Summarize the information by selecting and reporting the
data.meta_description: Discover numerous IELTS Writing Task 2 essay samples, ranging from band 4+ to 9, written by our users on the topic: the charts below show the most popular
data.text:
The charts illustrate the most-wanted films by genre for both men and women and general ticket sales for different types of film in the USA in 2010. Overall, what stands out from the charts is that the most popular genre among others was action. Another interesting thing is that the number of men who watched […]

The graphs illustrate the famous films for males and females and the sales of tickets for various movies in the USA in 2010. Overall, it is clear that the action films were the most popular genre. Another interesting point is that the number of men who watched this genre was more than women. Looking at […]

The bar chart illustrates most favourite type of movies regarding gender and pie chart gives detailed information about the proportion of the sold tickets for differ film genres in the USA during 2010. It is clear that while males preferred action films, females preferred romantic comedies. We can also see that the sales percentage of […]

The line graph illustrates the most-watched movies for women and men, and the pile chart gives information about sales of general tickets for different aspects of films in the USA in 2010. Overall, it can be seen that males love to watch action films most, whereas romantic comedy movies are the famous choice for females. […]

The line graph illustrates the most-watched movies for women and men and the pile chart gives the information about sales of the general tickets for different aspects of films in the USA in 2010. Overall, it can be seen that males love to watch actions films most whereas romantic comedy movies are the famous choice […]

The given bar graph and pie chart in combination provide the information about the genres that female and male parts of the society prefer, as well as illustrate the dynamic of box-office sailing in America during 2010. Overall, not only is the action top-genre among both female and male American audiences, but also it is […]

The bar chart illustrates the ratio of film’s genres that are most chosen by male and female and the pie chart describes the proportion of these genres contributing to the total ticket sales in the USA during 2010. Overall, action movies are the most famous genre among all movie categories while science fictions drew the […]
